value: - A trail to the top of this hill begins at the Pecan Grove campsite.
- There are many paved trails throughout the park which are good for biking. Bicycle rentals are available at the park store.
- On long summer evenings, young people flock to Garner Pavilion for a nightly jukebox dance, a tradition dating back to the 1940s. Nightly sunset to 11pm.
